p: The applicant makes reference to the ‘periodic testing’ of some representative flavourings premixtures for heavy metals (mercury, cadmium and lead), arsenic, fluoride, dioxins and PCBs, organo‐chloride pesticides, organo‐phosphorous pesticides, aflatoxin B1, B2, G1, G2 and ochratoxin A. However, no data has been provided. Since the distilled fraction of lemon oil is produced by steam distillation, the likelihood of any measurable carry‐over of heavy metals is low except for mercury (Tascone et al., 2014).
